item.title: DeFi 2025: The Rise of Real-World Asset Tokenization
item.description: Decentralized Finance (DeFi) is experiencing a paradigm shift in 2025, with real-world asset (RWA) tokenization emerging as the next frontier for yield generation and portfolio diversification.
